content.title: Dr. B. R. Ambedkar State Award To SC/ST/OBC/Minorities Students
content.details: The scheme provides state-sponsored scholarship schemes and reimbursement of tuition fees for eligible students belonging to SC/ST/OBC/Minorities categories.
eligibility: Must satisfy the eligibility criteria of the concerned scheme
content.application_process: Online application through the e-district portal or departmental web page.
documents_required: Other relevant documents as specified by the scheme

faqs.question: Students belonging to which category can apply for state sponsored scholarship schemes?
faqs.answer: Students belonging to SC/ST/OBC/Min category satisfying the eligibility criteria of the concerned scheme can apply.

faqs.question: How can applicants apply online for scholarship?
faqs.answer: Applicants can apply online through the e-district portal or the link available on the departmental web page.

faqs.question: Do I have to fill up the online application in one sitting?
faqs.answer: No, you can fill up the online application in as many sittings as you wish.

faqs.question: Is Aadhaar number required for applying online scholarship scheme?
What is the responsibility of Schools/ Colleges/ Institutes?
faqs.answer: They have to upload requisite information and authenticate/verify the details of the students.
